languages.text: "Среди слепцов и лжепророков мудрец в алой робе ищет ответ на вопрос. Не знает он, что искать надо не ответ, а вопрос, что все сведет воедино. Поможешь ему, Вольный Торговец? Но учти, что порою неведенье слаще забвенья".

traits.locale_text: "Среди слепцов и лжепророков мудрец в алой робе ищет ответ на вопрос. Не знает он, что искать надо не ответ, а вопрос, что все сведет воедино. Поможешь ему, Вольный Торговец? Но учти, что порою неведенье слаще забвенья".

languages.text: "Among the blind men and false prophets, a red-robed sage seeks the answer to a question. He does not know that it is not the answer he must seek, but the question that will draw everything into focus. Will you help him, Rogue Trader? But mark that sometimes ignorance is sweeter than oblivion."
languages.original_text: "Среди слепцов и лжепророков мудрец в алой робе ищет ответ на вопрос. Не знает он, что искать надо не ответ, а вопрос, что все сведет воедино. Поможешь ему, Вольный Торговец? Но учти, что порою неведенье слаще забвенья".

"Among the blind men and false prophets, a red-robed sage seeks the answer to a question. He does not know that it is not the answer he must seek, but the question that will draw everything into focus. Will you help him, Rogue Trader? But mark that sometimes ignorance is sweeter than oblivion."

"Among the blind men and false prophets, a red-robed sage seeks the answer to a question. He does not know that it is not the answer he must seek, but the question that will draw everything into focus. Will you help him, Rogue Trader? But mark that sometimes ignorance is sweeter than oblivion."

languages.text: “在无数盲目之人与假先知之中，某位红袍圣人正在寻求某个问题的答案。他不明白，他寻求的并不是答案，而是令一切成为焦点的问题。你会帮助他吗，行商浪人？但别忘了，有时无知比遗忘更加甜蜜。”
languages.original_text: "Among the blind men and false prophets, a red-robed sage seeks the answer to a question. He does not know that it is not the answer he must seek, but the question that will draw everything into focus. Will you help him, Rogue Trader? But mark that sometimes ignorance is sweeter than oblivion."

traits.locale_text: “在无数盲目之人与假先知之中，某位红袍圣人正在寻求某个问题的答案。他不明白，他寻求的并不是答案，而是令一切成为焦点的问题。你会帮助他吗，行商浪人？但别忘了，有时无知比遗忘更加甜蜜。”

languages.original_text: "Among the blind men and false prophets, a red-robed sage seeks the answer to a question. He does not know that it is not the answer he must seek, but the question that will draw everything into focus. Will you help him, Rogue Trader? But mark that sometimes ignorance is sweeter than oblivion."

languages.text: «Entre los ciegos y los falsos profetas, un sabio de túnica roja busca la respuesta a una pregunta. Desconoce que lo importante no es la respuesta, sino la pregunta, pues lo pone todo en perspectiva. ¿Le ayudará, Comerciante Independiente? Recuerde que, en ocasiones, la ignorancia es más dulce que el olvido».
languages.original_text: "Among the blind men and false prophets, a red-robed sage seeks the answer to a question. He does not know that it is not the answer he must seek, but the question that will draw everything into focus. Will you help him, Rogue Trader? But mark that sometimes ignorance is sweeter than oblivion."

traits.locale_text: «Entre los ciegos y los falsos profetas, un sabio de túnica roja busca la respuesta a una pregunta. Desconoce que lo importante no es la respuesta, sino la pregunta, pues lo pone todo en perspectiva. ¿Le ayudará, Comerciante Independiente? Recuerde que, en ocasiones, la ignorancia es más dulce que el olvido».

languages.text: 「盲目なる人々や偽りの預言者たちの中で、一人の赤い衣をまとった賢者が、ある疑問に対する答えを探し求めている。彼はそれが求めるべき答えではなく、すべてを焦点化する問いであることを知らない。彼を助けてくれないかしら、ローグトレーダー？でも、時には無知は忘却よりも甘美であることに気をつけるのよ」
languages.original_text: "Among the blind men and false prophets, a red-robed sage seeks the answer to a question. He does not know that it is not the answer he must seek, but the question that will draw everything into focus. Will you help him, Rogue Trader? But mark that sometimes ignorance is sweeter than oblivion."

traits.locale_text: 「目の見えぬ人や偽りの預言者たちの中で、一人の赤い衣をまとった賢者が、ある疑問に対する答えを探し求めている。彼はそれが求めるべき答えではなく、すべてを焦点化する問いであることを知らない。ローグトレーダーよ、彼を助けてくれないかさいら？でも、時には無知は忘却よりも甘美であることに気をつけるのよ」

languages.text: "Unter den Blinden und falschen Propheten sucht ein Weiser in einer roten Robe die Antwort auf eine Frage. Er weiß nicht, dass er nicht die Antwort suchen muss, sondern dass die Frage alles offenbaren wird. Werdet Ihr ihm helfen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Bedenkt jedoch, dass Unwissenheit manchmal süßer ist als Vergessen."
languages.original_text: "Among the blind men and false prophets, a red-robed sage seeks the answer to a question. He does not know that it is not the answer he must seek, but the question that will draw everything into focus. Will you help him, Rogue Trader? But mark that sometimes ignorance is sweeter than oblivion."

traits.locale_text: "Unter den Blinden und falschen Propheten sucht ein Weiser in einer roten Robe die Antwort auf eine Frage. Er weiß nicht, dass er nicht die Antwort suchen muss, sondern dass die Frage alles offenbaren wird. Werdet Ihr ihm helfen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Bedenkt jedoch, dass Unwissenheit manchmal süßer ist als Vergessen."

languages.text: « Parmi les aveugles et les faux prophètes, un sage en robe rouge cherche la réponse à une question. Il ignore que ce n'est pas cette réponse qu'il doit chercher, mais plutôt la question qui mettra tout en lumière. L'aiderez-vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Tout en sachant que, parfois, l'ignorance est plus douce que l'oubli ? »
languages.original_text: "Among the blind men and false prophets, a red-robed sage seeks the answer to a question. He does not know that it is not the answer he must seek, but the question that will draw everything into focus. Will you help him, Rogue Trader? But mark that sometimes ignorance is sweeter than oblivion."

traits.locale_text: « Parmi les aveugles et les faux prophètes, un sage en robe rouge cherche la réponse à une question. Il ignore que ce n'est pas cette réponse qu'il doit chercher, mais plutôt la question qui mettra tout en lumière. L'aiderez-vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Tout en sachant que, parfois, l'ignorance est plus douce que l'oubli ? »

languages.text: "Körler ve sahte peygamberler arasındaki kırmızı cübbeli bir bilge, bir soruya cevap arıyor. Asıl peşine düşmesi gerekenin cevap değil, her şeyi odak noktasına çekecek olan soru olduğunun farkında değil. Ona yardım edecek misin Hür Tacir? Lakin şunu da unutma: Bazen cehalet, unutulmuşluktan tatlıdır."
languages.original_text: "Among the blind men and false prophets, a red-robed sage seeks the answer to a question. He does not know that it is not the answer he must seek, but the question that will draw everything into focus. Will you help him, Rogue Trader? But mark that sometimes ignorance is sweeter than oblivion."

traits.locale_text: "Körler ve sahte peygamberler arasında, kırmızı cübbeli bir bilge bir soruya cevap arar. Asıl peşine düşmesi gerekenin cevap değil, her şeyi odak noktasına çekecek olan soru olduğunun farkında değil. Ona yardım edecek misin Hür Tacir? Lakin şunu da unutma: Bazen cehalet, unutulmuşluktan tatlıdır."
